author: MaSazi Ndlela
text:
It’s my husband calling me to make sure I sleep with the lights on and the door is locked because I am to scared after the series I watched…

I recommend marrying a kind and patient person. That’s him in this case🤣

author: MaSazi Ndlela
text: When God says he makes all things beautiful IN HIS TIME..

author: MaSazi Ndlela
text: Today I did my first run of 2021. The route was so empty it was disheartening. In that moment I was reminded that the ability I have to wake up and run as I am battling depressive thoughts is a privilege many people don’t have... 😐🙏🏽#gratitude #covid19SA

author: MaSazi Ndlela
text:
It’s 6 days into 2021 and the number of RIP’s is staggering...
To all those who have lost loved ones in this time, strength and light to you..
May we remember to be kind to each other everywhere because everyone is dealing in one way or another..
#CoronaVirusSA

author: MaSazi Ndlela
text: Got my car serviced yesterday at @hoopersvw Durban.. What an amazing team and impeccable service in light of the times we live in 🙏🏽❤️
